Record to Diary immediately after playing.

Retrieve a card from Diary into your hand.

Season cards have different effects in different seasons.
The card retrieved through reproduction is called an image. An image has ethereal and exhaust.
Spell Boost adds additional damage and block to Magic. It will be reduced by half after playing Magic.
Creatures with residual magic lose HP for every card with retain you have.
Prevent the next time you would lose HP.
